scripts.build: echo "DEBUG: Checking OPENWEATHERMAP_API_KEY..." && echo "DEBUG: Value is [$OPENWEATHERMAP_API_KEY]" && mkdir -p public && cp index.html script.js styles.css public/ && ([ -f 404.html ] && cp 404.html public/) && cp IMG_1542.jpeg public/ && node scripts/generate-env.js && echo 'Build finished.'
